SUB_HEADER: Welcome to my page! I am Erik Zurvalec. I am software engineer and I build web applications since 2021.
PROFILE_BOX: Erik Zurvalec is an Software Engineer. Erik has built web applications since 2021. He is interested in IT innovations, financial literacy and sport.

PROJECTS.PUBS_DESCRIPTION: IBM Publications Center provides a broad range of IBM publications, that can be downloaded free of charge. You can use the IBM search tool to find publications that are of specific interest to you. Please note that publications are not orderable on this site.
